title: Enhancing App Development Practical Skills: Collaborative Learning-Based Medical Education Reform and Diversity Promotion Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical knowledge and professional education experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more conflict factors within the medical education system by utilizing collaborative learning techniques.
Learners can design effective collaboration strategies with peers from diverse backgrounds by applying Social Interdependence Theory.
Learners can propose two or more customized instructional design plans that reflect the needs of underrepresented learners in medical education settings.
Learners can implement three activities that promote interaction among large learner groups in mobile microlearning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
